text: Coutances is a commune. It is in Normandy in the Manche department in northwest France. == Sights == * Coutances Cathedral * The church of Saint- Nicolas * The church of Saint-Pierre * The chateau of Gratot == Twin towns – sister cities == Coutances is twinned with: * Ochsenfurt, Germany * Troina, Italy * Ilkley, England, United Kingdom * Saint Ouen, Jersey, Channel Islands * La Pocatière, Canada == References == Category:Communes in Manche Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Coutances
